fields.description:
h5.Description
After updating to the lastest 0.11.12 build of Nodejs, my projects have thrown errors when trying to build.

h5.Steps To Reproduce
1. Install the latest beta build of Nodejs
2. Create a new project
3. Build the project

h5.Expected Result
Application should build successfully

h5.Actual Result
CLI throws the error:
{code}
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/dist/longjohn.js:184
        throw e;
              ^
Socket.socketErrorListener (_http_client.js:258:42),Socket.EventEmitter.emit (events.js:104:17),net.js:442:14,process._tickCallback (node.js:339:11){code}
fields.summary: Cannot build project to any platform using Node 0.11.12
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.9.2
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.3.201403190645
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.2.GA
CLI: 3.2.1
Alloy: 1.3.1
Node: 0.11.12
Npm: 1.4.3

comments.body: Node 0.11.12 is unstable and still has many issues such as the error in this ticket. Hopefully they are resolved before Node.js 0.12 ships.
Closing ticket as this issue is not our bug.
